title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Bethany, Oklahoma
content:
Photo submitted by James Smith, “I skipped work and rode from my apartment to the West River Trail, then rode north to Lake Overholser, and then a little further to some trails at the Stinchcomb Wildlife Preserve. Unfortunately, I broke my right clavicle into three pieces along the way.” We always love seeing photos from

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Bethany, Oklahoma appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
